title: Goldman Sachs CFO Stephen Scherr Recaps the Firm’s First-Ever Investor Day
description: This week, Goldman Sachs opened its doors for its first-ever Investor Day in its 150-year history. In this episode, Goldman Sachs CFO Stephen Scherr recaps the day and explains how leadership is trying to increase transparency with clients by releasing three-year financial targets, restructuring its business segments, and more. Scherr, who has been at Goldman Sachs for nearly 27 years and CFO since 2018, also talks about his transition into the role. To kick off the episode, Jen Roth of Global Markets gives her quick take on the five numbers she’s watching in markets.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:subtitle: A Conversation with Goldman Sachs' Stephen Scherr and Jen Roth
